body:
I think it's funny how they say if you ask for translations, you'll die like it's not some inevitable conclusion. We'll all die. Everybody dies eventually.
So, in the spirit of that, I formally request a translation of this doujin to english. Thank you and good night.

@NERDS sadly it doesn't seem so, i was fucking wrong ... but i can't translate a single word, so maybe (only maybe) someday there will be a part 2.0 and (maybe) that day we will have some kind of revenge. Keep your hopes up.

AND PLEASE, TRANSLATORS: TRANSLATE THIS COMIC
1.5 is kinda bad drawing compare with 1, specially mother's face. feels like rush in deadline
Please more NTR dont let the mc fucked the mom just let the brother fuck her, man its so sweet to see they are just fucking then the mc is crying outside just getting cucked please

@NERDS damn that's harsh... But hopefully mother visits sometime and they get a few good moments together, years later MC'S Bro and mom had a kid and he's surogate uncle that "takes care" of the brat.
@SuperCerati pls tell me ur right bout the revenge
atp mc might as well jus leave the house n try to make the mom guilty bout it
